text: Dorothy Lamour (born Mary Leta Dorothy Slaton; December 10, 1914 â€“ September 22, 1996) was an American actress and singer. She played Anita Alvarez in Swing High, Swing Low. She also played Norma Malone in the movie St. Louis Blues. Lamour was born in New Orleans. She died in Los Angeles at age 81 after a heart attack. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Louisiana Category:Singers from Louisiana Category:1914 births Category:1996 deaths
title: Dorothy Lamour
